Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-12819 affecting package pgbouncer for versions less than 1.25.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-12819 affecting package pgbouncer for versions less than 1.25.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.
